Amanda Gallagher is the Managing Director, Global Head of Client Data and Tech Solutions of New York Life Investments. She attended Columbia Business School.
Amanda Gallagher is known for Nostalgia: More than a Feeling (2017), Somebeachsomewhere: Horse of a Lifetime (2019) and The Trauma Toll (2018).
